message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it.
I understand you think $9000 is a bit low, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $11000
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $11500
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $12000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11500
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $11250 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $12000, but I'm willing to make one last concession. I can offer it to you for $11750
I appreciate your willingness to make one last concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product.
